actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that Members of the Congress may not make mass mailings as franked mail less than 28 days before a primary election or less than 120 days before a general election.

summary.text: Extends to 120 days the period before any general election involving a Member of or Member-elect to Congress within which such Member or Member-elect is prohibited from sending mass mailings as franked mail.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that Members of the Congress may not make mass mailings as franked mail less than 28 days before a primary election or less than 120 days before a general election.
